ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} Blow the whistle
{CHOICE}{CHOICE}to call the dolphin.
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:0, u3:0, u4:1, aplitude:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // “Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and
Mr. Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // “See that rod sticking out at the top?
If you jump just right, you can
climb to the top of the town.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // Priscilla
“Come back whenever you want to
see Mr. Dolphin!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“A gift? What am I
supposed to do with it!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“Hey! Hold on, we're coming!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“Jump to the top of the pole?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Priscilla
“Did you drown?
It gets deeper the farther you go out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Priscilla
“There's high voltage running
through the bottom of the tower.
Don't go near it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“No you're wrong!
We have nothing to do with the Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Barret}
“Good luck {Cloud}!
If you make it, we'll follow you!”{PAUSE}“Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you.
It'll break if it gets wet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“No! You got it all wrong!
We're fighting against the Shinra!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
“Now ain't that something!
I ain't never seen no dolphin jump like that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Barret}
“Good luck {Cloud}!
If you make it, we'll follow you!”{PAUSE}“Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you.
It'll break if it gets wet.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Red XIII}
“We don't get along with the Shinra.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Red XIII}
“Hey! It's a monster!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Yuffie}
“Hey watch your mouth!
We hate the Shinra!”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 b0 fd da 01 ef ff 19 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Priscilla
“Pretty cool, huh?
When I blow this whistle,
Mr. Dolphin jumps for me.”{PAUSE}“Here!!
This is for you, {Cloud}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // “Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and
Mr. Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // “See that rod sticking out at the top?
If you jump just right, you can
climb to the top of the town.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // Priscilla
“Who are you guys?
Are you members of Shinra, Inc.?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // Priscilla
“I don't believe you!
Get out of here!”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 8a ff ed fd d0 fe 3b 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // “My name is…
Pri-scil-la!
Now you say it.”

dialogStrings: Dolphin Offing

{Cloud}
“…That's how it is.”

{Cloud}
“Great…”

{Cloud}
“Hey! Hold on, we're coming!”

{Cloud}
“A gift? What am I
supposed to do with it!?”

{Cloud}
“Jump to the top of the pole?”

{Barret}
“No! You got it all wrong!
We're fighting against the Shinra!”

{Barret}
“Hey! Look at that!”

{Barret}
“Now ain't that something!
I ain't never seen no dolphin jump like that!”

{Barret}
“Good luck {Cloud}!
If you make it, we'll follow you!”{PAUSE}“Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you.
It'll break if it gets wet.”

{Tifa}
“No…stay calm…”

{Tifa}
“Look at that!”

{Aeris}
“No you're wrong!
We have nothing to do with the Shinra.”

{Aeris}
“What's that!?”

{Red XIII}
“We don't get along with the Shinra.”

{Red XIII}
“Hey! It's a monster!”

{Yuffie}
“Hey watch your mouth!
We hate the Shinra!”

{Yuffie}
“Whoa, Gawd!”
“He-y! Mr.Dolphin!”

Priscilla
“Who are you guys?
Are you members of Shinra, Inc.?”

Priscilla
“I don't believe you!
Get out of here!”

Priscilla
“Be careful, Mr.Dolphin!”

Priscilla
“Wait a minute.”

Priscilla
“Pretty cool, huh?
When I blow this whistle,
Mr. Dolphin jumps for me.”{PAUSE}“Here!!
This is for you, {Cloud}!”

“Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and
Mr. Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!”

“See that rod sticking out at the top?
If you jump just right, you can
climb to the top of the town.”

“You wanna jump with Mr. Dolphin?”
{CHOICE}Explain it to me again
{CHOICE}Sure
{CHOICE}I'll pass

Priscilla
“Come back whenever you want to
see Mr. Dolphin!”

Priscilla
“There's high voltage running
through the bottom of the tower.
Don't go near it…”

“My name is…
Pri-scil-la!
Now you say it.”

Priscilla
“Did you drown?
It gets deeper the farther you go out.”

“Jump up to the cargo ship
on the dolphin?”
